name: v0.6.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7

1. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ruby", version = "0.6.0")
```

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ruby", version = "0.6.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

# Skylib is a dependency, remove if you already have it.
http_archive(
    name = "bazel_skylib",
    sha256 = "74d544d96f4a5bb630d465ca8bbcfe231e3594e5aae57e1edbf17a6eb3ca2506",
    urls = [
        "https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-skylib/releases/download/1.3.0/bazel-skylib-1.3.0.tar.gz",
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-skylib/releases/download/1.3.0/bazel-skylib-1.3.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

http_archive(
    name = "rules_ruby",
    sha256 = "bfb4ae35ec8d3ffb864bd6a4e4bd4b2914ac52478f9636d5218801f2c0303df1",
    strip_prefix = "rules_ruby-0.6.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/releases/download/v0.6.0/rules_ruby-v0.6.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v7.0.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/67
* chore(deps): update p0deje/setup-bazel action to v0.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/68
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.45.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/69
* feat: expose toolchain and bundled binaries by @p0deje in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/70


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

name: v0.5.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7

1. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ruby", version = "0.5.0")
```

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ruby", version = "0.5.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

# Skylib is a dependency, remove if you already have it.
http_archive(
    name = "bazel_skylib",
    sha256 = "74d544d96f4a5bb630d465ca8bbcfe231e3594e5aae57e1edbf17a6eb3ca2506",
    urls = [
        "https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-skylib/releases/download/1.3.0/bazel-skylib-1.3.0.tar.gz",
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-skylib/releases/download/1.3.0/bazel-skylib-1.3.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

http_archive(
    name = "rules_ruby",
    sha256 = "9bfab76e1272dae72355c65cc858ede68b659716381485baa4c8e7a70ddc38a6",
    strip_prefix = "rules_ruby-0.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/releases/download/v0.5.0/rules_ruby-v0.5.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* refactor: change naming of external repository by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/42
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.0.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/46
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.0.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/47
* chore(deps): update dependency buildifier_prebuilt to v6.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/50
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.44.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/52
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.35.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/53
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/54
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.44.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/56
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.44.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/57
* chore: upgrade to Bazel 7 by @p0deje in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/58
* feat: update Ruby to 3.3 by @p0deje in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/55
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/59
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/60
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.45.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/61
* feat: introduce `rb_bundle_fetch()` repository rule by @p0deje in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/48
* fix: correct bundler version check by @p0deje in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/66
* feat: support RBE by @p0deje in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/65


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/compare/v0.4.1...v0.5.0

name: v0.3.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ruby", version = "0.3.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

# Skylib is a dependency, remove if you already have it.
http_archive(
    name = "bazel_skylib",
    sha256 = "74d544d96f4a5bb630d465ca8bbcfe231e3594e5aae57e1edbf17a6eb3ca2506",
    urls = [
        "https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-skylib/releases/download/1.3.0/bazel-skylib-1.3.0.tar.gz",
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-skylib/releases/download/1.3.0/bazel-skylib-1.3.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

http_archive(
    name = "rules_ruby",
    sha256 = "56819f7aa06074b2f10f288c321d3c611b5af2197cad2701e0b3f3637926152c",
    strip_prefix = "rules_ruby-0.3.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/releases/download/v0.3.0/rules_ruby-v0.3.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: Configure Renovate by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/29
* chore(deps): update p0deje/setup-bazel action to v0.3.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/31
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.34.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/37
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.43.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/35
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib_gazelle_plugin to v1.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/34
* Support registering system Ruby by @p0deje in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/28
* feat: improve runfiles handling by @p0deje in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/38

## New Contributors
* @renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/29
* @p0deje made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/pull/28

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_ruby/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: v0.1.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ruby", version = "0.1.1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_ruby",
    sha256 = "813963323ef591731993d1d7ee8dba6ac80064a46c290f1561559c1e433152dd",
    strip_prefix = "rules_ruby-0.1.1",
    url = "https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/releases/download/v0.1.1/rules_ruby-v0.1.1.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* lazily download ruby toolchain by @jgao54 in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/4
* support `rb_binary` with Gemfiles in subdirectory by @jgao54 in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/8
* Propagate bundle envs from rb_bundle to rb_binary by @jgao54 in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/10
* chore: add a .bazelversion file by @alexeagle in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/11
* chore: extend timeout for some tests by @alexeagle in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/20
* chore: introduce buildifier format/linter for starlark by @alexeagle in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/18
* chore: automate releases by @alexeagle in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/13
* chore: check buildifier on CI by @alexeagle in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/21
* feat: support bzlmod by @alexeagle in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/17
* chore: add bazelrc for CI by @alexeagle in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/24

## New Contributors
* @jgao54 made their first contribution in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/4
* @alexeagle made their first contribution in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/11

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/commits/v0.1.1

name: v0.1.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ruby", version = "0.1.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_ruby",
    sha256 = "3cd131af2865a008714aabb56c1db06f17bc1faaeca8d53322fe81da4d0ae01d",
    strip_prefix = "rules_ruby-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/releases/download/v0.1.0/rules_ruby-v0.1.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* lazily download ruby toolchain by @jgao54 in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/4
* support `rb_binary` with Gemfiles in subdirectory by @jgao54 in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/8
* Propagate bundle envs from rb_bundle to rb_binary by @jgao54 in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/10
* chore: add a .bazelversion file by @alexeagle in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/11
* chore: extend timeout for some tests by @alexeagle in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/20
* chore: introduce buildifier format/linter for starlark by @alexeagle in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/18
* chore: automate releases by @alexeagle in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/13
* chore: check buildifier on CI by @alexeagle in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/21
* feat: support bzlmod by @alexeagle in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/17
* chore: add bazelrc for CI by @alexeagle in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/24

## New Contributors
* @jgao54 made their first contribution in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/4
* @alexeagle made their first contribution in https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/pull/11

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/p0deje/rules_ruby/commits/v0.1.0
